name: It's going to Malte
description:
"It's going to Malte" is a 3D first person game. In a house turned upside down, like " Hello Neighbor ", the mom's objective is to prepare for an imminent departure by plane. 

But she has a kid in the house that she hates and wants to leave behind. She will have to run away from the child as fast as possible while completing her tasks, in order to avoid missing her flight, while leaving her child at home.

You can play the game with a keyboard & mouse or with a controller. Here are the PC controls:

"It's going to Malte" was made during an exclusive UNREAL ENGINE Game Jam by 9 people. We had a theme to respect which is a very famous Christmas movie: "Home Alone". We hope you will find our references in it.

Game Design

Fernand David - Pinson Antoine

Programming

Odeimi Edwin - Guichard Lucas - Malka Romain - Pejoiane Arthur

Art

Producing
